title: Obama campaign bosses Plouffe and Axelrod urge Biden to beef up digital operations to battle Trump
description: Two top-ranking veterans of President Barack Obama's 2008 campaign are warning Joe Biden that he needs to enhance his digital operation if he wants to beat President Trump.

title: Coronavirus deaths projected to hit 3,000 per day by June, internal Trump administration analysis says
description: President Donald Trump said on Fox News that the U.S. death toll from Covid-19 could reach 100,000.

title: Biden bundlers start focusing on raising cash for party fundraising machine
description: Joe Biden's bundlers are turning their focus toward raising money for the campaign's joint fundraising committee with the DNC.

title: Listen live: Supreme Court broadcasts oral arguments for first time ever
description: The Supreme Court case is a fight over whether Booking.com can trademark its name. The format of the arguments, which will be conducted over the phone, has proven even more controversial.
